title: 旧约 - 创世记(Genesis) - 第 25 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 创世记(Genesis) -- 第 25 章 ( 本篇共有 50 章 )

lineList.en: Then again Abraham took a wife, and her name was Keturah.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕又娶了一妻，名叫基土拉。

lineList.en: And she bare him Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah.
lineList.cn: 基土拉给他生了心兰，约珊，米但，米甸，伊施巴，和书亚。

lineList.en: And Jokshan begat Sheba, and Dedan. And the sons of Dedan were Asshurim, and Letushim, and Leummim.
lineList.cn: 约珊生了示巴和底但。底但的子孙是亚书利族，利都是族，和利乌米族。

lineList.en: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Hanoch, and Abidah, and Eldaah. All these were the children of Keturah.
lineList.cn: 米甸的儿子是以法，以弗，哈诺，亚比大，和以勒大。这都是基土拉的子孙。

lineList.en: And Abraham gave all that he had unto Isaac.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕将一切所有的都给了以撒。

lineList.en: But unto the sons of the concubines, which Abraham had, Abraham gave gifts, and sent them away from Isaac his son, while he yet lived, eastward, unto the east country.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕把财物分给他庶出的众子，趁着自己还在世的时候打发他们离开他的儿子以撒，往东方去。

lineList.en: And these are the days of the years of Abraham's life which he lived, an hundred threescore and fifteen years.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕一生的年日是一百七十五岁。

lineList.en: Then Abraham gave up the ghost, and died in a good old age, an old man, and full of years; and was gathered to his people.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕寿高年迈，气绝而死，归到他列祖（原文作本民）那里。

lineList.en: And his sons Isaac and Ishmael buried him in the cave of Machpelah, in the field of Ephron the son of Zohar the Hittite, which is before Mamre;
lineList.cn: 他两个儿子以撒，以实玛利把他埋葬在麦比拉洞里。这洞在幔利前，赫人琐辖的儿子以弗仑的田中，

lineList.en: The field which Abraham purchased of the sons of Heth: there was Abraham buried, and Sarah his wife.
lineList.cn: 就是亚伯拉罕向赫人买的那块田。亚伯拉罕和他妻子撒拉都葬在那里。

lineList.en: And it came to pass after the death of Abraham, that God blessed his son Isaac; and Isaac dwelt by the well Lahairoi.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕死了以后，神赐福给他的儿子以撒。以撒靠近庇耳拉海莱居住。

lineList.en: Now these are the generations of Ishmael, Abraham's son, whom Hagar the Egyptian, Sarah's handmaid, bare unto Abraham:
lineList.cn: 撒拉的使女埃及人夏甲给亚伯拉罕所生的儿子是以实玛利。

lineList.en: And these are the names of the sons of Ishmael, by their names, according to their generations: the firstborn of Ishmael, Nebajoth; and Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
lineList.cn: 以实玛利儿子们的名字，按着他们的家谱记在下面。以实玛利的长子是尼拜约，又有基达，亚德别，米比衫，

lineList.en: And Mishma, and Dumah, and Massa,
lineList.cn: 米施玛，度玛，玛撒，

lineList.en: Hadar, and Tema, Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah:
lineList.cn: 哈大，提玛，伊突，拿非施，基底玛。

lineList.en: These are the sons of Ishmael, and these are their names, by their towns, and by their castles; twelve princes according to their nations.
lineList.cn: 这是以实玛利众子的名字，照着他们的村庄，营寨，作了十二族的族长。

lineList.en: And these are the years of the life of Ishmael, an hundred and thirty and seven years: and he gave up the ghost and died; and was gathered unto his people.
lineList.cn: 以实玛利享寿一百三十七岁，气绝而死，归到他列祖（原文作本民）那里。

lineList.en: And they dwelt from Havilah unto Shur, that is before Egypt, as thou goest toward Assyria: and he died in the presence of all his brethren.
lineList.cn: 他子孙的住处在他众弟兄东边，从哈腓拉直到埃及前的书珥，正在亚述的道上。

lineList.en: And these are the generations of Isaac, Abraham's son: Abraham begat Isaac:
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕的儿子以撒的后代记在下面。亚伯拉罕生以撒。

lineList.en: And Isaac was forty years old when he took Rebekah to wife, the daughter of Bethuel the Syrian of Padanaram, the sister to Laban the Syrian.
lineList.cn: 以撒娶利百加为妻的时候正四十岁。利百加是巴旦亚兰地的亚兰人彼土利的女儿，是亚兰人拉班的妹子。

lineList.en: And Isaac intreated the LORD for his wife, because she was barren: and the LORD was intreated of him, and Rebekah his wife conceived.
lineList.cn: 以撒因他妻子不生育，就为她祈求耶和华。耶和华应允他的祈求，他的妻子利百加就怀了孕。

lineList.en: And the children struggled together within her; and she said, If it be so, why am I thus? And she went to enquire of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 孩子们在她腹中彼此相争，她就说，若是这样，我为什么活着呢（或作我为什么如此呢）。她就去求问耶和华。

lineList.en: And the LORD said unto her, Two nations are in thy womb, and two manner of people shall be separated from thy bowels; and the one people shall be stronger than the other people; and the elder shall serve the younger.
lineList.cn: 耶和华对她说，两国在你腹内。两族要从你身上出来。这族必强于那族。将来大的要服事小的。

lineList.en: And when her days to be delivered were fulfilled, behold, there were twins in her womb.
lineList.cn: 生产的日子到了，腹中果然是双子。

lineList.en: And the first came out red, all over like an hairy garment; and they called his name Esau.
lineList.cn: 先产的身体发红，浑身有毛，如同皮衣，他们就给他起名叫以扫（以扫就是有毛的意思）。

lineList.en: And after that came his brother out, and his hand took hold on Esau's heel; and his name was called Jacob: and Isaac was threescore years old when she bare them.
lineList.cn: 随后又生了以扫的兄弟，手抓住以扫的脚跟，因此给他起名叫雅各（雅各就是抓住的意思）。利百加生下两个儿子的时候，以撒年正六十岁。

lineList.en: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents.
lineList.cn: 两个孩子渐渐长大，以扫善于打猎，常在田野。雅各为人安静，常住在帐棚里。

lineList.en: And Isaac loved Esau, because he did eat of his venison: but Rebekah loved Jacob.
lineList.cn: 以撒爱以扫，因为常吃他的野味。利百加却爱雅各。

lineList.en: And Jacob sod pottage: and Esau came from the field, and he was faint:
lineList.cn: 有一天，雅各熬汤，以扫从田野回来累昏了。

lineList.en: And Esau said to Jacob, Feed me, I pray thee, with that same red pottage; for I am faint: therefore was his name called Edom.
lineList.cn: 以扫对雅各说，我累昏了，求你把这红汤给我喝。因此以扫又叫以东（以东就是红的意思）。

lineList.en: And Jacob said, Sell me this day thy birthright.
lineList.cn: 雅各说，你今日把长子的名分卖给我吧。

lineList.en: And Esau said, Behold, I am at the point to die: and what profit shall this birthright do to me?
lineList.cn: 以扫说，我将要死，这长子的名分于我有什么益处呢。

lineList.en: And Jacob said, Swear to me this day; and he sware unto him: and he sold his birthright unto Jacob.
lineList.cn: 雅各说，你今日对我起誓吧。以扫就对他起了誓，把长子的名分卖给雅各。

lineList.en: Then Jacob gave Esau bread and pottage of lentiles; and he did eat and drink, and rose up, and went his way: thus Esau despised his birthright.
lineList.cn: 于是雅各将饼和红豆汤给了以扫，以扫吃了喝了，便起来走了。这就是以扫轻看了他长子的名分。
